**Information Technology Security TRA and C&A Analyst and Information Technology Security Design Specialist**

**Reference #** cb-511-67140992
**Solicitation #** 5000073532
**Publication Date** 2023-09-27
**Tender Closing Date** 2023-10-12T15:00:00
**Current Tender Status** Exired

Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) requires the services of a Level 3 C.3 Information Technology Security TRA and C&A Analyst and a Level 3 C.7 Information Technology Security Design Specialist. The successful bidder will provide support to system owners for secure development, implementation, operation, and disposal of IT systems, services, and/or programs throughout the system development life cycle.

**Key Requirements:**

*   The services will be delivered for a **National Capital Region (NCR) base**.
*   A **combined rating of technical merit and price** will be used to evaluate bids.
*   **Bidders must submit a bid for all resource categories**.
*   The work is currently not being performed by a contracted resource.

**Security Requirements:**

*   **Security clearance is required** for this project.
*   A **Designated Organization Screening (DOS)** is the minimum corporate security requirement.
*   A **FSC – Secret** is the minimum resource security requirement.

**Resources:**

*   **2 x Level 3 C.3 Information Technology Security TRA and C&A Analysts**
*   **1 x Level 3 C.7 Information Technology Security Design Specialist**

**Bidding Details:**

*   **Procurement method** is competitive and selective tendering.
*   Bidders must comply with the relevant trade agreements (Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), etc.).

**Contact Information:**

*   Please contact Alyssa at [alyssa.festeryga@ec.gc.ca](mailto:alyssa.festeryga@ec.gc.ca) or (902) 201-4251 to inquire about this tender opportunity.

**Attachments:**

*   The tender notice is available at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca). Please refer to the attached files (5000073532_npp.pdf, 5000073532_apn.pdf).
